Reviews.Title: “BrÄ±llÄ±ant stay”
Reviews.Author: vlp50
Reviews.Content: We had a great stay at Hotel Lausos, lovely fresh clean room, nÄ±ce breakfast Ä±ncluded and Ä±ts locatÄ±on Ä±s wonderful to get around the old town only a couple of blocks from the Blue Mosque. The staff are very frÄ±endly and helpful we would defÄ±nÄ±tely stay here agaÄ±n when Ä±n Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “This is was absolutely wonderful”
Reviews.Author: alix a
Reviews.Content: The Hotel Lausos is situated in a fantastic part of sultan ahmet. Located near all sights, it is easy to walk or if required a stone's throw from the tram stop. All this, but in a quiet area. The staffs were fantastic and couldn't have been more helpful witch directions, possible tours and restaurants. The rooms was comfortable and a good size. It was good value for money with the wonderful breakfast. I very much recommend this Hotel and will certainly stay here again should we visit Istanbul in the near futur.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent feedback”
Reviews.Author: Fuad H
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Lausos Hotel in March 2012 based on feedback from Tripadvisor. Excellent small family-like hotel with great location just in the very centre of Istanbul, close to all major sightseeings and tram station. At the same time not noisy as i was expecting it to be. Special thanks to Mustafa Bey and Chengiz Bey for making our stay so comfortable, going even beyond with offer to upgrade our room to Topkapi suite, which was fantastic. Overall, enjoyed it very much!!!

Reviews.Title: “easter break”
Reviews.Author: Adel B
Reviews.Content: A lovely small sized family run hotel, the location was key as it was in the heart of Istanbul providing very easy access to all the nearby historic sites. The staff were very friendly and cheerful, but most importantly they were extremely efficient, and could not do more if you asked. A very pleasant experience and would recommend to anyone looking for a nice getaway to a culturally enriched city.

Reviews.Title: “dream suite not so dreamy”
Reviews.Author: Abhinand
Reviews.Content: My wife and myself stayed here for 4 days during march 2012. 3 of these days were at dream suite and the last day in the sulthanhamet suite. When we first walked into the dream suite, we were taken aback by the view. You have a view of the blue mosque and the hagia sophia on one side and a view of the bhosphorus over a few buildings on the other side. The room is slightly bigger than an average hotel room. Negatives of the dream suite are as follows. - Surprisingly, they did not have enough curtains to cover all the windows. - One of the curtain rails were broken. - room was very dimly lit. - The worst part of the room however was the bathroom. It was small and ridiculously dim lit. You could hardly look at your face in the mirror. On the last day of our stay here we moved to the sultanmhet suite. In comparison the dream suite, the room was just perfect. Spacious with pretty much the same view. The bathroom was much bigger and had a jacuzzi. The dream suite in comparison had a small shower cabinet into which a six footer like me would have trouble fitting into. What really was a surprise was that the hotel was selling the dream suite suite at a much higher rate that the sulthanmhet suite. It is ridiculous to pay more for a compromise in basic comfort (read - a decent bathroom). Another annoying issue was the motion sensor lighting that was installed. We usually had to take a few nervous steps in complete darkness before the lights switched on. To talk about the positives, - The hotel is at a lovely location, walking distance to all the major attractions. - Most of the staff in the hotel are really helpful and very accomodating. Jehangir at the reception and the lady who looks over breakfast helped us out a lot. - They have a very neat and decent spread for breakfast. On the whole, we had a nice time at Lausos and if were visiting the hotel again, I would defenitely stay clear of the Dream suite. Staying in a better room for lesser money sure makes a lot of sense to me. Cheers Abhinand

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful hotel in a wonderful city”
Reviews.Author: ibolya z
Reviews.Content: Spent a week in the hotel with my sister, where we enjoyed great hospitality from an extremely helpful and friendly staff. Perfect location, main sights, many shops, restaurants in walking distance. Safe and lively neighborhood. Big thank you to all and especially Yasemin for adding to our Istanbul experience! Ibolya

Reviews.Title: “THE BEST PLACE TO STAY IN ISTANBUL !!”
Reviews.Author: Zaid3
Reviews.Content: The hotel was super clean, the staff was the best among all 4 and 5 star hotels I've ever stayed in "especially jenkiz" that guy was super friendly and helpful and all other staff were like family to us :) The location is the best in all the old city of Istanbul near the tram station n right in front of the blue mosque and hajia Sofia ,Mado cafe z few steps away and zia restaurant and other very tasteful restaurants r very close by and it's only a walking distance from the grand bazzar and Aksaray shopping square. Very beautifully decorated rooms with great jaccuzi in the colorful bathroom. The food z tasty as well. Everything about this hotel is just wonderful. Definitely staying at Lausos Hotel Istanbul and nowhere else next time and many more times. P.S: i wish toilets were warmer.

Reviews.Title: “A Home Away From Home..!”
Reviews.Author: mohsin b
Reviews.Content: Me and my wife came back from here yesterday after a weeks break in istanbul...This hotel is amazing..the location is superb..and the hospitality of these people is secound to none.. They provide you with all the local info and advice..nothing is too much for these guys. My wife really enjoyed the complimentery tea that was alwaus bought to our room on request.. when ever you are in istanbul always give thes guys a try you will never be dissapointed we will be back in august.. Thanks to Mustafa and his team especially, cengiz ,mustafa morgul ,mustafa akdenir and karakus..for making our trip a great one...!!

Reviews.Title: “Superb Hotel with Wonderful staff !!”
Reviews.Author: MrTS82
Reviews.Content: This hotel is great located near the main monuments in the area Sultan Ahmet, just 5 minutes walking distance to Aya Sofia mosque, Topkapi palace and Sultan Ahmet Cami (The Blue Mosque). Rooms: Very coisy and clean! The decoration is in ottoman empire insparated and you get a very nice feeling of a old ottoman turkish living. Staff: Wonderful and so warm! Always happy and give you service in a high level. Specially the staff; Yasemin, Servet and Mustafa, thank you for your warm welcoming and service on our 2 years wedding celebration, and for making our stay fantastic! Breakfast: Very Good! Many variations of many turkish deliciouses. Fresh! Sum up: WeÂ´re definitly recommend Hotel Lausos especially for the personal high service the staff gives you! Warm greetings to the staff Yasemin, Servet and Mustafa!

Reviews.Title: “The hotel is on a walking distance to all the Historical sites and Museums.”
Reviews.Author: FRED D
Reviews.Content: Weloved the room, very comfortable and clean with good wi-fi and several Englishlanguage TV channels. Veryfriendly and welcoming staff always ready to help and assist. The location of the hotel is very convenient to many attractions. At the next tramstation - SultanAhmet - you have four main attractions: The Blue Mosque, HagiaSophia, Topkapi Palace and the Bascilica. The breakfast buffet offered a good variety of different types of food. I would defy famous 5-star hotels to do a better job in making guests feelwelcome and important to them. The hotel is reasonably priced and excellent value for money. I wholeheartedlyrecommend this hotel. Thank you so much for enhancing our magical trip.

Reviews.Title: “Cheap rooms suited for one person only”
Reviews.Author: karius
Reviews.Content: We stayed here in september 2011. Our room was a small one. It was equipped with a double bed, one chair and a small table. Just suitable for a single backpacker. I had to leave the room when my wife wanted to open her suitcase. Bathroom however was OK. And the room was clean and towels changed every day. Breakfast in the small garden was a nice start of the day. There were probably other rooms of a higher quality in the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Thank you so much for enhancing our magical trip.”
Reviews.Author: lee r
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Lausos hotel in January. It was absolutely wonderful there. The view from the room, it is really a fantastic view to Blue Mosque and Hagia Sophia! The breakfast was great, a wide variety to choose from.The localization of the hotel really on the heart of Istanbul oldcity. Very friendly and welcoming staff always ready to help and assist. I would recommend this hotel and will stay there again next time. 10 out of 10.

Reviews.Title: “We loved Hotel Lausos.”
Reviews.Author: Zak B
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed here right at the new year, 2012. We were upgraded to from the Topkapi Suite to the Sultanamhet Suite on arrival. Very nice room. Everything in good working order and well put together. We really appreciated the level of service that we got from the hotel. One particular case speaks of this for me. My wife got very sick while we were there... let's call it "Constantine's Revenge." At 1am I came down to reception and asked for help finding my way to an all night pharmacy. The two gentlemen worked together to find a place across town that would be open and then called a very good taxi driver to take me straight there. If I had tried to do all that on my own it would've been a huge ordeal. Quite possibly another taxi driver would've taken advantage of me too. As it was I made it back to the room with the meds we needed in less than an hour. This showed real hospitality. You can't do better than that. We look forward to returning.

Reviews.Title: “Great Experiance”
Reviews.Author: jean d
Reviews.Content: Very friendly, fliaxable and helpful staff. The room was very clean and the beds very comfortable. The location was excellent for both sightseeing and restaurants, easy walking distance to all main attraction and near all historical places. Breakfast is very good . We loved everything and we Will definitely return to Lausos hotel ."highly recommend"

Reviews.Title: “Excellent staff, luxury and great 360 view of city.”
Reviews.Author: TheRafaySaleem
Reviews.Content: We stayed here 3 nights and booked 2 rooms best thing about this hotel is we found homie touch away from home. Hotel is not too big but very quiet and comfortable rooms with great views of whole city specially Blue mosque, Hagia sophia Marmara sea. Grand bazar Topkapi palace is less then ten minutes walking distance, we think we saved money not using taxis tram or buses. we will definitely stay here during our summer trip to Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Willingness of the staff to help you.”
Reviews.Author: Junghoon_Suk
Reviews.Content: Whatever you request, the staff at Laosus is most likely to carry on as long as their capability. Particularly, as in concierge service, do not hesitate to ask since staff members are there to provide you with valuable information. The room I stayed is a bit small, but still cozy and decent and the wonderful shower system is enough to cover this issue up. Consider This hotel when you come to Istanbul!

Reviews.Title: “Maximum convenience and quite”
Reviews.Author: roslu
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Hotel Lausos in Istanbul for 6 nights. The location is unbeatable! just steps from the Blue Mosque and all the other historic sites, and if you want explore the rest of the city the tram is just half a block away. Still the area is pretty quite and sleeping is not a problem. In spite of been next to a small mosque, the muezzin chant really didn't bother us and we heard him calling people to prayers only a coule of times a day and at very reasonable times. The rooms are small but in the norm for Europe. Our room had a nice view of the sea and Bosporus and on the last night they upgraded us to the Honeymoon suite which had an amazing view. The rooms are clean and the beds are really confortable. The only thing missing are drawers to store clothes. The bathroom are nice and clean. The concierge was extremely helpful whenever we needed information. The staff was always very nice and courteous. Breakfast was good...nothing fancy but the buffet has a good selection that can satisfy all different tastes or diet requirements. Overall a very nice hotel that allowed us to enjoy this beautiful city to the fullest.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, interesting features, but a little worn out”
Reviews.Author: khatalina
Reviews.Content: The hotel is very conveniently located in 5 min walk from Blue Mosque and other attractions. By arriving to the hotel i was surprised we have to pay for all our stay upfront. They allowed us to see the room first after asking. We had Honeymoon suite in the corner with panoramic windows from bottom to top, with a see view. It looked great, even the room was very small. But it was not a big deal since we stayed only 4 nights and did not stay in the room much. The hotel and furniture is a little worn out, but at least the bathroom was new. I've seen other rooms on the top floor and they had very nice view as well. Not sure about lower floors. The breakfast was ok, mind the salty joghurt though. After all, if you are fine with the price, the hotel is ok. Obviously there are meluzins singing before the dawn waking you up ( even though the bellboy said they won't), but this probably caannot be avoided in the center.

Reviews.Title: “Superb!!!!”
Reviews.Author: SamiraEmil
Reviews.Content: Lausos Hotel is located in the Sultanahmet area, hotel is within walking distance of all the historical attractions and just 5 minutes from the Grand Bazaar. The room are compact but well- designed and very, very clean. There is free Wi-Fi. The staff is very polite, helpfull and professional. I stayed there with my husband and three children from 06-09-11 to 11-11-11. Every morning Yasemin offered something special to our children but there wasn't any need, because they surve very rich and delicious breakfast. Yasemin, Mustafa, Servet, Jengiz, other Mustafa, Erol are very friendly and hospitable. My family misses them, my daughter Ayan(3 years old) asks me to return to the hotel. Definitely recommended. Samaaliyeva@ yahoo.com

Reviews.Title: “Excellent room, kind staff, nice view at room”
Reviews.Author: joussi j
Reviews.Content: Location of the hotel is super! There was no need to spend time on getting to main attractions of the city.Breakfast is very nice, clean room and friendly staffs. We were very satisfied and would highly recommend the Neorion.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location,friendly service and good value for me”
Reviews.Author: saeed_llr
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel after reading reviews on it on tripadvisor.We stayed at Lausos for six nights from 18th-24sept.Our six day package was booked through American express and included room,bfast,half day sight seeing tour,transfer to and from airport and of course the welcome drinks on arrival. The hotel as expected was small,as most hotels are in Sultanahmet area. We stayed in corner room 303 which had a partial view of the sea and the street below.The room was small and included all basic amenities such as minibar,that was reasonably priced,flat TV and telephone etc.The double bed was comfortable and we slept well.The bathroom again was very small indeed but very clean and included a shower cubicle with rain shower,hand shower etc.The room was cleaned and towels changed daily.The cleaning lady was a nice woman who cleaned whenever we asked her in the day.The wi-fi worked efficiently in the room and common areas and we didnt have any signal issue at all. The front desk staff was helpful and well informed about restaurants and tourist sites in the Sultanahmet area.All major historical sites such as Blue mosque,Basilica Cistern,Topkapi, Hagia Sophia and the grand Bazar are all within walking distance of the hotel.The breakfast was more than adequate with cereals,fresh fruit,eggs,both boiled as well as scrambled,cakes,bread and tea/coffee. Mustafa the gentleman who attended to the guest at breakfast was always obliging.One day i had my eggs changed three times as i was not happy with the way they were cooked,and Mustafa had no problem in getting the kitchen to change them. The hotel is within walking distance of the Sultanahmet tram station and we used the tram regularly to go to Taksim sq and Istiklal st. We highly recommend lausos hotel to those visitors who want to stay in Sultanahmet area.

Reviews.Title: “Everything is excellent including the staff, services, room, etc”
Reviews.Author: chris p
Reviews.Content: Extremely nice and helpful staff. Comfortable beds. Hotel in good location as close walking distance (2 mins) to Blue Mosque and Hagia Sophia. A very good breakfast buffet. Free transfer from the airport. Internet was free and worked well. We enjoyedbour stay. I recommend this hotel and I will stay at it if I visit the city.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel!!”
Reviews.Author: Geetha C
Reviews.Content: Fantastic stay at the Hotel Lausos!! The staff were kind and friendly and went out of their way to make our stay wonderful. Reservations were made via e-mail with Mr. Mustafa and all arrangements were exactly as described. The rooms and bathrooms were very clean and the location was very close to all the major tourist sites but on a quiet side street so not a lot of noise. The outdoor patio was a great place to have a drink and chill out after a long day of sight seeing and breakfast was great. I cannot say enough about the excellence of the staff, especially Gengis and Yelin - Thank you so much!! If you are looking for a great hotel, you will not go wrong with the Hotel Lausos.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location and professional helpful friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: tom V
Reviews.Content: Great location in the center of Sultanhamet, few hundred meters from Blue Mosque, Aya Sofia, Topkapi Palace and Grand Bazar. Rooms are clean, beds are comfortable. The hotel staff will always be a step further your expectations to make you enjoy your stay in Istanbul. Excellent value for money. Thanks for all of them. I will highly recommend this hotel

Reviews.Title: “We loved our stay at Lausos Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Miamiam43
Reviews.Content: The location is just the best, close to a lot of nice restaurants cafÃ© and tourist attractions. Beautiful room, very clean and the air conditioning working very Well. The staff is ever so nice, respectfully friendly.breakfast was great

Reviews.Title: “Just 2 minutes from the blue mosque and the other historical attractions.”
Reviews.Author: Lucyyyy
Reviews.Content: The room was very nice and comfortable. The air conditioning in the room was excellent.It has an excellent location, few steps away from Blue Mosque and Aya Sofia,etc.the staff (all of them) are friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “The location of the Hotel was excellent”
Reviews.Author: Trantranfree
Reviews.Content: The location of the Hotel is great.The view from the room is absolutly fantastic.Very clean room and the staff are very friendly and helpful

Reviews.Title: “Everything is good including the staff, services, etc.”
Reviews.Author: ferry p
Reviews.Content: Extremely nice and helpful staff. Comfortable beds. Good location, close to main tourist spots in Sultanahmet district. Free transfer from the airport.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely brilliant”
Reviews.Author: paulkoukoun
Reviews.Content: Always a friendly face on reception, whatever time we arrive and always ready to go the extra mile to ensure a comfortable and relaxing stay. The room was very nice and comfortable. The hotel is near the Blue Mosque and Hagia Sofia (~5 min. walking) also Topkapi Palace (5 min) and Grand Bazaar (10 min walking).The very good value for money and ideal location in the old Sultanahmet district.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel in a great location”
Reviews.Author: Doudouglas
Reviews.Content: Location is excellent it is walking distance from all the major sights in old Istanbul and is also 2 minutes walk to tram stop. The whole hotel is newly renovated so all the furnishing and fixtures are updated and clean. Front desk service is very helpful and available all hours. Buffet Breakfast has a very large selection. I highly recommend this hotel. I really thank you hotel staff they made me fill privileged

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely loved it! Can't recommend it highly enough!!!”
Reviews.Author: charlesgareth
Reviews.Content: Already at the reception one received a cozy welcome. The entire staff from reception, over cleaning personal to breakfast room staff was very friendly and at least bi-lingual. Location is superior. Just 2 minutes from the blue mosque and the other historical attractions. Also, it is close to all other facilities in Sultanahmet areas such as restaurants bazaars tram etc. It's very safe environment where you can go out late without having to be afraid. Excellent room with Fantastic panorama view

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place to stay”
Reviews.Author: joyjohnson1971
Reviews.Content: The personnel was very good, they helped us with all our questions/problems, including carrying our luggage, giving us a wake- up call last night to get to the airport, arrange the airport shuttle, etc. The room was very nice and comfortable. The hotel is near the blue mosque (~5 min. Walking), and from there you then reach all other central Istanbul places.

Reviews.Title: “We loved the location, small hotel but very friendly & helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: Lausos
Reviews.Content: This hotel has the most amazing view of the "Blue Mosque". Very very central, you cant ask for more. The tramp station and the HOHO bus point is just next door. The Sultanahmet is a lively place and brings the best culture of Turket live. If I have to go back to Turkey, I would like to stay there again !. Mustafa is the man to ask for !

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel on a central location.”
Reviews.Author: azhar68
Reviews.Content: Extremely nice and helpful staff. Comfortable beds, new hotel. Wonderful location, close to main tourist spots in Sultanahmet district.

Reviews.Title: “Gorgeous hotel”
Reviews.Author: jandma05
Reviews.Content: We only stayed one night after our trip to Gallipoli, and it was beautiful. The bathroom was great, with a spa bath (very much appreciated after the sleeping bags of Gallipoli). The bed was big and comfortable, with a flat screen tv. It was located close to the Blue Mosque and most sights. The staff were very helpful and spoke very good English. They organised our transfer to the airport the next day at a good rate.

Reviews.Title: “Thank you for everything Hotel LAUSOS”
Reviews.Author: jeanjean31
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Lausos Hotel and everything was just fabulous location, staff, and room. The hotel staff welcomed their guest with great hospitality. The location is very close to all main sightseeing places in old Istanbul and easy to reach other places by Tram. I definitely recommend Lausos Hotel to Istanbul lovers.

Reviews.Title: “I would not hesitate to recommend this hotel.”
Reviews.Author: geertyan
Reviews.Content: Friendly and helpful hotel staff. The hotel looks very new and our room was very clean and comfortable. We booked a double room with city view but to our pleasant surprise, were put in a double room with sea view at the same price. Very good location, good breakfasts. Good price-to-quality ratio. I would not hesitate to recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “I would highly recommened Lausos Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Fafararayus
Reviews.Content: Excellent location at Sultanahmet Square and 2 'min from Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque. Our room was very nice and quite (we chose one of those with the sea and Blue Mosque view). Service was excellent and the staff was very friendly and helpful. Breakfast was superb, a lot of variety for all tastes.

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: aleks58
Reviews.Content: Hotel Lausos is in a great location, right next the The Blue Mosque and within easy walk of all the sights. We stayed in the Sultanamet Suite which directly overlooked The Blue Mosque. Very clean hotel although room itself was a bit small for the 220 Euro/night price tag.

Reviews.Title: “I can't recommend this hotel highly enough!”
Reviews.Author: kimsulyvan
Reviews.Content: One of the best boutique hotels I have stayed in. The staffs were all excellent, polite, friendly and speak very good English. Excellent location, only minutes walk from many historic attractions. The room was immaculate, the beds were very comfortable, and the look of the hotel was gorgeous Thank you to Servet, Erol, Mustafa, Kamil and the rest of the team. I will definitely stay at the Lausos Hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful”
Reviews.Author: Crampneys
Reviews.Content: Excellent access to Istabul attractions. Room clean and comfortable with the added wow of a jaccuzzi bath (you could turn the bubbles on and off). The views of Istanbul were wonderful. The Blue Mosque and Hagis Sofia are lit up at night giving a wonderful fairyland view out of the window. We stayed for a long weekend and had a good night's sleep, enjoyed the jaccuzzi bath and the advice and guidance from the very helpful staff. We wanted a Hammam which we could go to as a family and not be seperated. The one recommended was exactly as we wanted. Transport was on time, Hammam was a wonderful experience. All taxis ordered arrived on time, for sightseeing and transfers to and from the airport. Fully recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful staff, wonderful hotel, wonderful location!!”
Reviews.Author: tomas032
Reviews.Content: The staff were extremely attentive and keen to help whenever they could. The rooms were immaculately decorated and maintained, new towels were provided and the beds made every morning. The breakfast buffet was great and offered tasty bits of what Turkey has to offer: cheese, bread, olives, yoghurt, tomatoes, fruit etc. The hotel location is near to everything and safe at night time so it was perfect , we will stay their for sure next time we visit istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Everything was perfect. Highly recommendable hotel.”
Reviews.Author: antoine015
Reviews.Content: Locations is great,staff was very kind,helpful well trained,my stay was pleasant and comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Super staff, good breakfast, clean, quiet. I highly recommend it!”
Reviews.Author: Wihelm
Reviews.Content: This was an excellent hotel in terms of service, rooms and location. Interior design is superb,luxuried, has a very comtemporary but also very historical feel. They provide a great free breakfast. You can walk to Blue Mosque, Sophia Hugia, Topkapi Palace or Basilica Cistern in minutes. Will be recommending to friends and family and will definately be coming back

Reviews.Title: “Right in the heart of Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Gal4onok
Reviews.Content: We had amazing room on the 5th, last floor with a view on the Marble Sea with all needed stuff for a great stay. Hotel is very well located - 3 min walking from Blue Mosque. Staff is friendly. Absolutely value for money.

Reviews.Title: “Incredible Hotel,”
Reviews.Author: eric188575
Reviews.Content: Very well located, very confortable and with a gentle staff. The bed was incredible and the shower was marvelous. The breakfast is delicious and complete. We will return soon.

Reviews.Title: “perfect location”
Reviews.Author: herlof
Reviews.Content: The hotel was modern and clean. The staff were extremely friendly and helpful. It had a really good location in the old city. it was on a trm line and also walking distance to all the tourist places.The buffet breakfast was good.

Reviews.Title: “The only place I will stay in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: janwouter20
Reviews.Content: I loved the room a lot, it is so beautiful and so special! And I love the location of the hotel, as it is only walking distance from all the historical location that everyone wants to see.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Place in Istanbul.”
Reviews.Author: alanbrooke1
Reviews.Content: The location of this hotel is amazing, within minutes walk of many major sights including blue mosque, Topkapi palace, basilica cisterns and Hagia Sofia. The hotel itself is incredible value for money- the room was large and comfortable very quiet and all amenities worked well including Jacuzzi tub and efficient air conditioning. Breakfast is good, we thought the selection of fruit cheese, bread, coffee was very good. Finally the staff at the hotel were very helpful especially booking restaurants for dinner. Overall a great experience. Thank you for everything.

Reviews.Title: “The Djazair Couple”
Reviews.Author: Fatima35
Reviews.Content: I had never thought in my life that Istanbul is a beutifull city but when I went in December I was very surprised I went back in the history and discoverd that Istanbul is more than a city in each street & each place there is a history behind back to Roman, byzantis, ottoman, turk. Istanbul is the best place to visit at anytime of the year there is a lot of things to see from historical side and also the entertainment at the city day or night. Back to my comment on the Hotel lausos please see my comments below. Hotel it self is well located in Istanbul in the old city called Sultan Ahmet and near all the startegics and hostorical places to visits.Bluye Mosque, Sophia Hagia, Topkapi ect...sometimes no need for a car just walking through not far from the hotel. The Hotel is very nice the rooms are perfect and very clean and tidy. Room service very good. The most high rate I can give is for the staff of the Hotel which are all very professinal and well educated people.They welcome us very freindly and we enjoyed their help in identifying places to visit where to eat ect.. I really want to name to staff that I really appreciates their help during my stay in Lausos between 25th December 2010 & 1st January 2011. Erol,Servet, Sedat, Kerem, Mustafa Kemal the other Mustafa, Ozduman Ans special thanks to Kamil Karakuz the Hotel Owner for making the necessary in developing the staff and the service. I wish all the best for 2011 and hope to see you again from Djazair Kamal & Fatima

Reviews.Title: “Charming small hotel in great location for sightseeing”
Reviews.Author: supergeo
Reviews.Content: Our room was small but beautiful with a brand new bathroom. Gorgeous view of the Sea of Marmara. Great breakfast and an international clientele that we enjoyed. Wonderful, fresh breakfast. Charming, helpful staff. Walking distance to everything in Sultanahmet and to the tram to travel further. The honeymoon suite can get warm during the day but cools off in the evening with air conditioning plus has huge sliding glass doors in 2 sides that open. We loved the call to prayer in istanbul. I am shocked by anyone being surprised by it. There are hundreds of mosques in Istanbul so yes you will likely hear the call to prayer in the morning. It lasts for about 5 minutes and is one of our fondest memories of this incredible city.

Reviews.Title: “I Found the Hotel Perfect”
Reviews.Author: Rick043
Reviews.Content: Hello Trip Advisor This hotel Is on a perfect place by the blue Moskee Beatiful The food was very good And very clean I go in Juli one more time to Hotel Lausos

Reviews.Title: “OK”
Reviews.Author: Litsahamburg
Reviews.Content: Our room was small and loud (because of the Camii, we were at the street side) but very clean, breakfast rich and tasty, hotel service very kind and helpful, (except one, but he was there only after midnight), gut area, 5 min. Saint Sofia and Sultanahmet, 10 min. Grand Bazar, 5 min. Cemberlitas Hamam. Thank you Evangelia Sivris

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location; Clean & Freindly. Air Con & Wi Fi - Feeble .”
Reviews.Author: Sidmarch
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for nearly a week with a friend of mine. Located a stones throw away from major tourist attractions and tram lines. Sumptuous breakfast spread. Friendly staff; but not very well informed about the city or its attractions. Rooms and the bathrooms are furnished well - the ones on the fourth floor. Could use a bit more space to move around though. Rooms on the first floor room are really, unlivably crammed ! The air conditioning really sucks. They offer free Wi Fi; but it seldom works even when the signal strength is displayed as excellent; when reported, the front desk looked clueless. Have fun in Istanbul :-) Stay away from salads !

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant Hotel, a perfect Location, close to historic attractions.”
Reviews.Author: garcia2010
Reviews.Content: We stayed in Lausos hotel for 5 days. room 404 was amazing: big and had a beautiful view overlooking to the sea. the staff and personnels were very friendly and helpful. i'd go to this hotel if i visit Istanbul again.

Reviews.Title: “If you want to stay in Sultanahmet area, Lausos Hotel is the best choice”
Reviews.Author: catalano759
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed for 7 nights in the Lausos Hotel from July 2 th to June 8 th. We had booked junior suite with Ã  beautiful view of Sea of Marmara, Blue Mosque and ayia sophia church. The room was clean and comfortable with clean linen and comfortable mattresses. A very clean bathroom with a jacuzzi, powerful showers - even one simulating a rainfall. Moreover, the hotel is in a perfect location for visiting the old city, everything is within walking distance! The best thing about the hotel was the staff. They are re very friendly and helpfulâ€¦ We will return.
